key_takeaways: Solution: Acquire X Games IP and modernize content distribution and community engagement (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Leverage cultural moments and media to drive mainstream adoption of niche interests (Channel: content)
Strategy: Acquire undervalued IP with strong community following - specifically targeting X Games for $50M
Startup Opportunity: Acquire and modernize X Games as extreme sports media platform (Target: Extreme sports enthusiasts, content consumers, ath)

startup_ideas.title: Acquire and modernize X Games as extreme sports media platform
startup_ideas.target_market: Extreme sports enthusiasts, content consumers, athletes
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of mainstream extreme sports content and community engagement
startup_ideas.business_model: Content licensing, event production, sponsorships, media rights
startup_ideas.validation: Fervent community exists, stable participation in extreme sports, proven historical success

market_gaps.title: Declining visibility and commercialization of extreme sports despite stable part
market_gaps.solution_approach: Acquire X Games IP and modernize content distribution and community engagement

trend_opportunities.title: Major media companies divesting from non-core properties
